title: Startup splash screen not centered if display scale > 100%
author: bruste77
body_snippet:
If I set my display scale to 125% splash screen is not centered.
I tried to change WindowStartupLocation attribute to "CenterScreen" in FrmSplashScreenNew.xaml and to comment all code to center it in Programroot.cs and it worked with scale 100% and 125%.
